name: Pura The Robot
description:
A humoristic and futuristic game made by 16 year old teenager from Bosnia. Please don't mind the grammar mistakes in the game remembering that English language isn't his main language !

Also, don't mind that there is no MAC download or Linux. We are unable to purchase the gamemaker licenses, so, donations are welcomed !

The game was made for a LD 39 game compo on the theme : Running out of power !

You play as a robot trying to make himself the first model that survived the test. If he makes it to the end, he will start a new series of production based on him.
I don't want to spoil the gameplay a lot by describing the mechanics soo you'll have to try the game your self !

If you can't beat the game, you can take a look at my guide to win :

http://forums.indiegamer.com/threads/pura-the-robot-all-puzzles-solved.60810/
